1606750.name: Crimson Tactics: The Rise of The White Banner Soundtrack
1606750.description: Explore into the medieval world of adventure and magic through the original soundtrack of Crimson Tactics: The Rise of The White Banner. The soundtrack creates a vivid listening experience as it features every event with its own unique representation, making each stand out with a character of its own as much as they vibrate together with a feeling of thrill and excitement.
